textFR: Ei si seuls les 18-34 ans avait le droit de vote? Ou seulement les femmes? Ou les diplômés? Ou alors tout ça à la fois? Qui serait élu?
textEN: What if only young people could vote? Or only women? Or graduates? Or a mix of the above? Which president would be elected?

textEN: An analysis of the tweets sent by French supporters during the soccer game against Spain on the 23rd of June 2012. They never believed in a victory.
